researchItems.title: Our Journey & Impact
researchItems.description: From leading research projects to becoming an Active Delegate in DAOs, Lampros DAO has played a vital role in Web3 governance.

researchItems.title: Governance & Research
researchItems.description: Driving decentralized governance through research, proposal discussions, and active participation in Arbitrum DAO and Optimism Collective.

researchItems.title: Workshops & Education
researchItems.description: Empowering Web3 contributors through workshops, seminars, and hackathons. Learn, build, and engage with DAOs like Arbitrum & Optimism.
